name: Justice (itch) (2Weeks)
description:
"Gear up rookie! You're next..."

Justice is an action shooter game suitable for blind and visually impaired people. It is an audio game with minimal graphics that have no effect to the actual gameplay (play with your eyes closed if you want, it doesn't matter). 

It is developed in Unity3D for Windows by the 2Weeks team. This game was created with love for all people with any visual impairment and entered the AGG Blossoms 2023 competition. 

🎧 A headset is strongly recommended! 🎧

Please consider filling up this survey after playing the game, to help us improve it!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdd6o6FBhootTwdBYD2RQs4-731sRPdPwPb1soj...

Controls: 

W, S:  Move

A, D:  Rotate 

Space bar: Send echolocation pulse

Left Mouse Button: Fire

Esc: Close game

And follow in-game instructions
